entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Rondeau (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of freezing drizzle. Local amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023
